entry.title: KMP算法的模式T的next值推算
entry.content: next值的定义 当j = 0时，next[0] = -1 集合非空情况下，next[ j ] = max{ k | 1 ≦ k < j 且T[0]…T[ k - 1 ] = T[ j - k ]…T[ j - 1 ] } 其他情况，next[ j ] = 0 设模式T=abcabaa，根据next[j]的定义，计算分析过程如下：j = 0时，next[0] = -1j = 1时，next[1] = 0j = 2时，1 ≦ k < 2，得k{1} ，根据定义公式，k = 1时，T[0] ...T[0] = a ，T[1]...T[1] = b，a ≠ b，根据定义的第三点，next[2] = 0j = 3时，1 ≦ k < 3，得k{1,2}，根据定义公式，k = 2时，T[0]...T[1] = ab，T[1]...T[2] = bc，ab ≠ bc，k = 1时，T[0]...T[0] = a，T[2]...T[2] = c ，a ≠ c，得到next[3] = 0j = 4时，1 ≦ k < 4，得k{1,2,3}，根据定义，k = 3时，T[0]...T[2] = abc，T[1]...T[3] = bca，abc ≠ bca ，k = 2时，T[0]...T[1] = ab，T[2]...T[3] = ca，ab ≠ ca，k = 1时，T[0]..T[0]= a，T[3]..T[3] = a，a = a，所以next[4] = 1以此类推，next[5] = 2，next[6] = 1 得出模式T的值为{-1,0,0,0,1,2,1}

entry.title: jackson使用记录
entry.content: 记录jackson操作json的常用例子,基于2.x版本,持续更新…… JSON源字符串{"firstName":"jack", "age":18, "sex" :"男","birthday":"2013-08-04 00:00:00"} JSON字符串转JavaBean@JsonPropertyOrder({ "birthday","age","name","sex"}) // 序列化JSON的属性顺序@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true) // 是否忽略未知属性@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL) // 序列化不包含属性值为NULL的属性public class Person { @JsonProperty("firstName") // 别名,与JSON字符串的firstName属性对应 private String name; private int age; private String sex; @JsonFormat(timezone = "GMT+8", pattern = "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") // 格式化输出日期 private LocalDateTime birthday; public String getName() { return name; } public void setName(String name) { this.name = name; } public int getAge() { return age; } public void setAge(int age) { this.age = age; } public String getSex() { return sex; } public void setSex(String sex) { this.sex = sex; } public LocalDateTime getBirthday() { return birthday; } public void setBirthday(LocalDateTime birthday) { this.birthday = birthday; } public static void main(String[] args) { String str = "{\"firstName\":\"jack\", \"age\":18, \"sex\" :\"男\",\"birthday\":\"2013-08-04 00:00:00\"}"; ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper(); mapper.registerModule(new JavaTimeModule()); // 使用java8的LocalDateTime,需要导入jackson-datatype-jsr310包 Person p = mapper.readValue(str, Person.class);} 待续……

entry.title: 工厂模式-设计模式
entry.content: 工厂模式，字面上理解，工厂就是生产产品的，而设计模式中的工厂就是拿来创建对象实例的，通过工厂统一去生产或创建，一切交给工厂，减去繁琐的步骤，就能轻松通过工厂来获得产品。 工厂模式样例以工厂生产家具为例，现代人们需要家具的时候，不会自己去造家具，而是通过工厂去造，不必自己费心费力。 家具抽象类public interface Furniture { void name();} 沙发家具产品public class Sofa implements Furniture { public void name() { System.out.println("沙发"); }} 椅子家具产品public class Desk implements Furniture { public void name() { System.out.println("椅子"); }} 抽象工厂public abstract class AbstractFurnitureFactory { public abstract <T extends Furniture> T createFurniture(Class<T> c);} 生产家具工厂只要通过参数需要什么类型的家具，工厂会帮你创建一个家具，通过反射的形式，能根据传入的家具类型来创建需要的家具。 public class FurnitureFactory extends AbstractFurnitureFactory { public <T extends Furniture> T createFurniture(Class<T> c) { Furniture furniture = null; try { furniture = (T)Class.forName(c.getname()).newInstance(); } catch (exception e) { System.out.println("生产家具失败，废品"); } return (T)furniture } }}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
